body:
This PR (initially?) contains  a prototype script for extracting commit hashes for a release's PRs (as identified by a single column in a GitHub project).  The goal is to 

Known issues when used for a point release:
- distinction between squashed and unsquashed commits for some multi-commit PRs is not accurate
- sorting of commits across PRs and timezones can result in interleaved commits

Note that `tgamblin` started the script and provided the basic algorithm.
title: [WIP] Feature: Commit identification from project PRs
